def_cn: （人）给予帮助的，帮上忙的
def_en: If you describe someone as helpful, you mean that they help you in some way, such as doing part of your job for you or by giving you advice or information.

def_cn: （信息、建议等）有帮助的，有用的
def_en: If you describe information or advice as helpful, you mean that it is useful for you.

def_cn: (事物）有助于改善局面的，有好处的
def_en: Something that is helpful makes a situation more pleasant or more easy to tolerate.
